articles.author: Luis Prada
articles.title: CDC Reveals Concerning Reason Americans Are Coughing So Much - VICE
articles.description: If you’ve noticed your friends, family, or coworkers coughing like they were actively attempting to flip themselves inside out, there’s a chance they may have had whooping cough, otherwise known as Pertussis. That’s because as of a CDC report issued on Decemb…
